column1: Canadian pipeline transport of oil and other liquid petroleum products, monthly (cubic metres) 1

column2: Due to rounding, components may not add to total (where applicable).
Includes the following liquid hydrocarbons: crude oil, condensate, pentanes plus and synthetic crude oil.
Exports include deliveries of Canadian produced oil, condensate, natural gas liquids and petroleum products destined for use outside of Canada.
